title: Symptoms of an Affair
itunes:author: Guests: Jeff & Cheryl Scruggs
itunes:summary:
When a person chooses to cheat on his or her spouse, it will have devastating consequences on the marriage. John, Greg and Erin will address this heavy topic and provide hope to those who have been betrayed by a spouse. Featuring Jeff and Cheryl Scruggs.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY

Receive the Scruggs' book "I Do Again" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-03-08?refcd=1324303

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/symptoms-of-an-affair/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/hope-for-every-marriage-digital-product/?refcd=1324303

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
